website_summaries.verdict: Four-burner, restaurant-grade, and professional-quality griddle. A great replacement if you want to get rid of your BBQ or grill.
pros: Propane-fueled grill heats up fast and cooks evenly
Easy to cook large amounts of food for guests
Grills up burgers wonderfully, as well as makes dynamite breakfast options
cons: Grease may run down along bottom and front of griddle
Tank mount is hard to use

customer_reviews.title: GRILLIN' LIKE A VILLAIN
customer_reviews.text: If you ever want to see your boyfriend have an erection and grill at the same time, buy him this. He pushes it around outside like we're at a teppan grill. I look out of the window and admire my tough guy, delicately flipping my gardenburger on this monstrous grill. Trust me, size matters. Get the 36". We bought the canvas cover to prevent rust and to hide it from the elements. I know that if my boyfriend ever cheats on me that this will be the first thing that I vandalize, because he loves it THAT much. Even more than his Star Trek light up phone he bought in 1984.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Fortuna

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the grease drain design..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill and would have been 5 stars if not for the serious hot grease running down the leg from a poorly designed drain setup... I reemed the hole out to 1" and tig welded a steel tube in, that's really what Blackstone should do from the factory...
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Got my grill today, I saw a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Got my grill today, I saw a lot of reviews that covered the grease dripping issue, I think they have made a design change as mine has a bead of weld just aft of the grease dripping hole. this appears to allow the runoff to drip into the pa. I'm still in the process of seasoning it, once that is done I'll update my review
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing to ever happen to me
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing to ever happen to me. I have an awesome son and a beautiful wife but they pale in comparison to my griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great griddle. The only drawback is when you cook there will be oil splatter in the background. So if you are cooking against a wall or a fence it will leave splatter stains.
customer_reviews.author: HonestConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My wife did significant research on this grill and we were looking forward to using it. I read some of the negative reviews online but kept my fingers crossed. Unfortunately, the first grill arrived 6 days after the original delivery date and was missing an instruction manual, knobs and the few screws/bolts needed to complete (clearly a repackaged grill). The second one arrived 4 days later and had all of the correct parts. However, upon building it the igniter mechanism seemed loose and not well placed. It turned on once and then stopped functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Igniter would not work and company won’t respond to email about sending a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Nannette Powell

customer_reviews.title: This grill changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I had been without a grill for 3 years. My family and i usually go out for burgers. However, i bought this grill right before the Covid-19 stay at home order was issued. This grill has been our food MVP. We grill fantastic burgers, homemade fried rice, homemade quesadillas, seared tuna steak, steak, and we have even made our own flatbread pizzas on the grill. I highly recommend this grill. If you do purchase, before you use it, there's a youtube video by Blackstone giving instruction on the proper way to season the grill prior to it's first use.
customer_reviews.author: Mcdotim

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase for this exact item from Amazon. I bought one for myself and was complete. This purchase was for a wedding gift. Upon assembly I observed the total ignition system was removed and the ignition button was taken out of the parts package. This product appeared to have been bought to salvage parts and then returned. No signs of usage on the grill or the wheels and everything was still wrapped. When ordered, details were not provided that parts were removed and missing.
customer_reviews.author: Loraine Andaya

customer_reviews.title: Rusts out even when covered!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Cslustomer service never responded to me after numerous attempts. I ended up throwing out the grill in the trash. Huge waste of money. Cheaply made with poor craftsmanship. Buy something else. Hope you have a place to store it inside or under cover. After less than 2 years (always covered) just about all of it has rusted out. The burners, knobs, screws, etc. It started off great and worked well when it was newer. Now, it's a large piece of trash that I don't know how to get rid of. It's too expensive of a product to have to rebuy everything couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Lou L.

customer_reviews.title: Leaking regulator after one use
customer_reviews.text: The grill would be great if the regulator didn't leak. When I contacted Blackstone, they were rude in their reply and questioned how I determined the regulator was leaking. You could actually smell the leak and see fumes where it was coming out. To further determine the issue, we used leak detector. I do not recommend spending this amount of money based on the cheap regulator. Furthermore, Blackstone stated that they do not warrant their grills if bought from Amazon and I would need to get any refund or replacement from them. This is after he asked me if I registered the product!! Unbelievable! He was NO help all! Next steps are to call the better business bureau.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will probably never to back to flame grilling again
customer_reviews.text: This is the best 'grill' I've ever owned. I don't think I will ever go back to flame grilling again. The versatility of this griddle is amazing. Be sure to watch the videos on the Blackstone website. You will learn quite a bit about proper 'griddling'. Take the time to properly season your griddle and clean it after each use. Look at my photos and you will see a well seasoned griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Cerberus76

customer_reviews.title: Terrible decision i made
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so dissappointed with a grill in my life Got myself what i thought was a good grill for my birthday and it sucks ! Grill sets to far away from burners and never gets hot enough to grill ! And burners go out with the slightest breeze , this grill should not b an outdoor grill ! And wouldn't b good to bring inside , which would defeat purpose of having outdoor grill ! Ranks as worse grill i ever bought ! So dissappointed !
customer_reviews.author: clove

customer_reviews.title: Great grill exception Please read
customer_reviews.text: This is a great griddle grill with the exception of the gas regulator of poor quality it takes away from the quality of the well made unit. I am having troubling getting enough gas to heat the grilling area it worked great for a week now it is not I call customer support and they told me to disconnect the tank and gas regulator to reset it I reinstalled the gas regulator and turned on the tank slowly and still not working properly very disappointed with customer support. I just ordered gas regulator from Amazon I can't be bothered with Blackstone customer service do to the lack of quality of the gas regulator I cannot recommend this gas griddle :(
customer_reviews.author: Eugene C

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The order of the assembly could have been better. For example, the propane guard could have been assembled while it is upside down which would have made it much easier without you having to get on your hands and knees later. The packaging wasn't all that good. Mine came with several dents and scratches which the manufacturer knows you're not going to go through the troubles to return it, but then again, you get what you pay for. The burners didn't work that well. I had to use a lighter to jump-start it. Any light winds will make it a challenge to start the burners. My suggestion is don't expect too much and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas H.

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic and looks great in our outdoor kitchen
customer_reviews.text: A very well made product!! Works fantastic and looks great in our outdoor kitchen. I would highly recommend that you prepare for the delivery though. This unit is heavy and requires 2 people to move the box or at least the use of a dolly. Assembly was super fast and easy. HONEST! The specially designed cover is also very well made and is certain to last many years. Oh and the manufacturer is great too. We reached out to them directly with questions before we made this purchase. Their fast and curteoous response was really helpful. This is one of our favorite Amazon purchases and we would highly recommend this product by this manufacturer without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Sherne

customer_reviews.title: Coating cracks after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of use, not every day, The coating is cracking all over the plate. Seems toxic to me. Won’t be using it anymore and can’t return it as date has passed. Very unhappy about this issue
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa G.

customer_reviews.title: Envy of the Campground
customer_reviews.text: Brought this camping and cook breakfast for the "neighborhood" of six friends camping. Made bacon, eggs, sausage, pancakes,,,you name it for everyone as they watched. It was enjoyable to cook on this because I didn't have to mess with pans, etc. Just season the grill, cook and scrape it off. No cleaning necessary! I was the chef every morning and they couldn't say enough about how good the food tasted. I would not recommend the larger griddle as the top cast iron is about as heavy a I would like and still be portable. Stick with the 28". It's the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: Edited to add: within two weeks the griddle was peeling. Even with a cover and constant use this griddle is constantly rusting. Griddle top had rust on the bottom. Easy to put together though.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: This is the best buy I have made
customer_reviews.text: This is the best buy I have made, and the best griddle! It took no more than 15-20 minutes to Assemble. easy to season. heated up quickly and was used right away for my son's 16th birthday. This griddle has so many uses, I am in love with it. we made hand made tortillas, pupusas, grilled meat, heated tortillas, grilled veggies. took it camping, and to a bbq. easy fold and slide into my car. I highly recommend.. I only wish I bought the bigger griddle, but overall I am extremely happy with it...
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Palafox

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle! Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: So far we are happy with it. I like how they fixed the oil drip/waste pan and put it in the back of the griddle. Much better place to scrape everything. After seasoning the griddle and using it for the first time, the flames were very low even on high. So I turned it off & restarted it and that fixed the problem. Not sure what happened there. But hopefully it won't be a future problem. But it was very easy to assemble and worked great after we got the burners working good.
customer_reviews.author: KevShots

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill.. cook anything on it
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill so much that we have used it four times in one week. We love that you can cook anything on it. We even ordered the metal and cloth grill covers. It’s been a great addition to our quarantined life style. Update: We have had this grill a month and continue to use it often. Tonight we made philly cheese steak sandwiches. I should have taken a pic but we ate too fast lol. They were delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Googler

customer_reviews.title: We love this Blackstone 28" griddle
customer_reviews.text: Just the Wife and myself so we went with the 28" model. I have been well pleased and we have used it many times already. From unboxing to complete set up takes 20-30 minutes. Instructions are easy to understand and very basic skills needed to assemble. Blackstone has a great support from Facebook and Youtube groups. Lots of recipe ideas out there. We really like this unit. Price was good!
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Made pancakes in the mornings and hamburgers for lunch for 150 people for 6 days. No complaints.UPDATE AFTER ONE YEAR: I am leaving my four star rating, but have a couple of issues after using this (on and off in a concession) for a year. The black coating on the cooking surface has partially disappeared, but does not interfere with it's cooking use. Nothing is "peeling", the black is just going away in places. Also, the grease hole is too small, and the drip pan does not hold enough for the amount of drippings I have, so I attached a galvanized Steel Mud Pan that drywallers use for their spackling mud. Works much better.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill I have ever cooked on
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this grill. It was easy to put together and seasoning it went well. We followed the steps on the YouTube video on the Blackstone channel. We use grape seed oil. Cleaning it is a breeze. It really doesn't take much effort. We have used it for just about everything. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Came with missing parts- won’t ignite
customer_reviews.text: After assembling the grill I connected the propane and noticed that only one of the four burners was lighting up I took the griddle top off and noticed two screws are missing that holds up the burners .... Which is not something I had to put together it came already pre-fabricated . So I found some small screws ( temporary) and have to manually lighting the grill now because the ignition switch won’t lite them...which is ridiculous! Made sure you season big time cause things stick bad the first time
customer_reviews.author: kelli steadman

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't we buy one a long time ago?!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the bees knees!! My husband and I came across one of these for the first time in a store a couple months ago and within a few days we decided to order one online. We love it!! It is so much fun making our own hibachi style dinner at home as well as fajitas/tacos and breakfast! The possibilities are endless!! And cleanup is a breeze! My husband plans on getting a second one to keep up at the 4-wheeling & hunting cabin. It will be a great way to cook for a large number of people breakfast, lunch and dinner. It's like having our own Diner!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: great unit !
customer_reviews.text: Find myself using this for more things than I thought. Reheat pizza, left over Tex-Mex, tortilla shells heating, all kinds of uses. Got a large tray to transport things and the inside kitchen stays so clean and the griddle is so fast at getting things up to temp. One of the best purchases I made. Got rid of the gas grill. LIke that this unit is dedicated to being a griddle not a conversion. So out door cooking is Big Green Egg and this griddle, that's all you need
customer_reviews.author: dave the cm

customer_reviews.title: Cooks like an ice cube
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews of this product I was excited to purchase it for myself. It is garbage. There is about a 3-4" gap between the propane burners and the heat diffuser underneath the griddle. There is about a 1" gap between the griddle and the frame. This leads to dramatic heat loss. Any slight breeze causes a significant drop in temperature. The design is extremely poor. The griddle does not heat up to an appropriate level. It will cook a 1/4" thick burger in about 40 minutes. There are also numerous cold spots on the griddle. Even on the center of the cooking surface there are areas that will not get hot. I would avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Paul

customer_reviews.title: A must for mobile food vendors
customer_reviews.text: everything came as expected however during assembly I ran into a problem with the tray on the side it was almost as though they didn't measure it or test it which implies a lack of quality control! if you're playing about 15 minutes to get it on and seated to my satisfaction! Having said that, my new Blackstone is already earning money toasting buns serving hot dogs and sausages and breakfast. I can't wait to keep trying new menu items.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R

customer_reviews.title: Great product and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We feel as though the burners should be more S curves throughout the griddle heating sources or an added burner. Where the fire was not located, the griddle remained light colored during the 5 coats of seasoning and across the front and back of the griddle surface were like small waves of built up seasoning even though we made sure everything was coated evenly at least in our eyes. In saying all of this, we cooked on it last night, and we are southern, fried potatoes left side , mushrooms in the middle, and fried squash/zucchini on the right side all at once. Wonderful! And the griddle cleaned up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: carlene hill

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality.. easy to set up... looks and feels great... sturdy.. only down fall, very heavy... I watched the product support video on how to season it.. very easy to do.. I have nothing bad to say about it.. I did purchase some grill accessories.. surround table and the grill box.. seems to heat evenly and hot.. the igniter works very good. My neighbor stopped by and is very jealous.. This is a nice product, wheels around great, legs are sturdy and foldable.. For the price and quality, you not be disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: kikker

customer_reviews.title: Rust!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this product!! Started rusting after first use...continues to get worse!! Great concept...poor product!! I wish it could have been returned. I just kept thinking we could get around this rust issue...apparently not...wasted $$!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am not a bit happy. I wish I could get the new design ...
customer_reviews.text: Well the picture showed the new design. I got the old. I am not a bit happy. I wish I could get the new design top.
customer_reviews.author: sandi n.

customer_reviews.title: Now this Griddle is awesome, so much more you can do with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Now this Griddle is awesome, so much more you can do with this than a BBQ grill, in most cases your imagination is your limit... not hard at all to assemble, aprox. 15 min with 2 people for lifting the top griddle. works like a charm right out of the box. i was cooking on it 1 hour after receiving it. good quality. One thing i wish they work on for the next model, higher heat deflectors on the sides and improve the grease drain rail and trap can. overall, i would recommend to everyone, i'm very very happy with this purchase and so is my family.
customer_reviews.author: mhmh2222

customer_reviews.title: It's a flat top griddle that seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had was that the LP tank mount did not fit this 20lb LP tank so I just took it back off and set the LP tank on the floor. That means I have to move the tank seperately from the grill; which is on casters. The cooking surface is supposed to be "pre-seasoned" but I didn't trust it so I re-seasoned it before using it. It's getting there but just take it easy and treat it like any other steel (or cast iron) cooking surface (skillet). Also, watch out for discolorization (rust) in humid areas of the country and keep it both oiled and covered when not cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great cooker but....
customer_reviews.text: I really like and enjoy my Blackstone. It's everything I hoped it would be. I;ve made mny successful meals and I:ve cooked from meals for two all the way to parties of 10 or more, Two complaints though. 1. Lighting the burners per instructions, takes too long for comfort. 2. There is a lot heat generated below the burners, which makes the storage shelf useless,. containers and tools become too hot to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: This Griddle Takes the Guesswork Out of Cooking
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my outdoor griddle. I have had it for a while now. The possibilities are endless on what I can cook on it. I have cooked breakfast, stir fry, steak, burgers, grilled cheese, and the list goes on! Clean up is hard at times, and I keep mine in my garage to prevent too much moisture and rusting. The grease catcher is a feature that I hope gets upgraded with newer models. Heat is easier to control with this griddle as opposed to my previous traditional gas grill and its flare up. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: A 5 Star, but
customer_reviews.text: Have to give assembly a one star due to frame being received damaged. When pulling the legs into a vetical position they could not be raised as the bracket into which they were to slide iwas crushed and had to be bent back. Also, I had to install a sheet metal screw to hold the pan which the burners were attached to. This pan was damaged badly, so much so the spot weld had broken free. An easy assembly was made difficult due to the damage to the frame. The box it came in showed no indication of the damage that was to be evident upon opening.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, does what you need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the grill for what I needed to do however my patio has oil stain do to the oil not going into the grease trap but rolling down it. And it’s extremely hard to clean without scratching off the later of non stick. My grill now sticks because I can’t clean it properly. I wish this were stainless steel top then I could’ve cleaned and scrubbed better.
customer_reviews.author: Steff

customer_reviews.title: Great for employee events at our factory!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Blackstone flat top we've purchased, the first one was several years ago, and they've made some significant improvements to the design on this latest model. Specifically, they have redesigned the griddle with a lip towards the operator, and moved the grease drain to the center back. We've cooked with the newer and older design side-by-side, and the newer design is much improved. The old design works fine, but the changes make it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle. Great value too.
customer_reviews.text: Great griddle. And contrary to what many reviewers stated you can skip attaching the legs and put it on a counter. Preferably a non flammable counter like a outdoor kitchen like mine. Several reviewers said I couldn’t forgo the legs but seeing is believing and I’m glad I ordered anyways. This is a hit for us so far. We’ve done a couple breakfast and bacon 3 times. Grilled chicken and Philly cheesesteak sandwiches which is a favorite already 3 times. Can’t miss.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: The height
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new Grill today, the assembly was easy , everything looks great, the only thing I’m disappointed in was the height from the floor up, I just recently cooked on the 36” version and loved everything about it. So I purchased this 28” one didn’t really need that much cooking space, but when I got it and assembled it , it feels way shorter than the 36 inch version. Other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.R.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product out there for cooking especailly when camping
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product out there for cooking especailly when camping! My husband has cooked two pounds of bacon to get a good coating on it...we love this and you can cook so much at one time which saves time too!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy !!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to write this review but I am, so here it goes I have had the flat top for about 3 months and it has gave me problems on and off. The regulator gets tripped easily and I have had it replaced by black stone already once.I was cooking for an event and it turned off and could no longer cook. I was really disappointed and now I had raw food. I have requested for a refund and am awaiting to hear back. Will update as soon as they do and if I haven’t updated, its because they ignored me. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Much improved over first generation design wit the grease exit in the back.
customer_reviews.text: I had the larger first addition of this. It leaked grease down the leg. This design is better with a grease opening on the back. I converted it to natural gas with the black stone kit. It was easy and the kit is complete. I like this griddle for cooking spatter prone meat like bacon outdoors. In 20-30 minutes I can precook 2 1/2 lbs bacon, store in a zipper bag and finish it in the microwave between two paper towels for breakfast. Fast, mess free and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Witt

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Now -- It rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give 6 or 7 stars. This is a great product. Arrived on time. Assembly was VERY easy. It works perfectly. Have been cooking on it as often as possible. Food gets cooked fast and it is delicious. Contrary to many videos I saw on youtube and other places... you DO NOT need very much oil when you cook on this. After the top was seasoned it became super non-stick and literally can cook with only a couple drops of oil for most things. Also... no problem at all with the drip issue on the oil drain hole.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron 123

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great; needs improvement in quality control and design
customer_reviews.text: Cooks good, nice heavy weight iron cook top. However came with two small creases/dents in top frame; the pin for releasing the legs is missing one of the two rivets so had to improvise with sheet metal screw; grease trough and drip hole/pan needs to have a small spout welded to bottom to make sure grease goes into pan and does not run along the bottom of the V trough and down the leg to the ground - made a big mess the first time out. As another review said, a 1$ modification could solve this issue. Also could have used some leveling devices to ensure the cook top is angled to front and right for grease flow.
customer_reviews.author: Swiss Xpat

customer_reviews.title: Great first griddle for me
customer_reviews.text: Some minor issue but I still love it, I cook on it all the time. Easy to clean I bought the official lid as well. The top griddle has little legs that slide into the base mine are a little crooked but I don't care it doesn't really hurt anything. Temps from high to low are about 200 degree difference 400-600 plus or minus 25 on average. I'm able to get a good enough sear and cook the rest on the other side. Sometimes when trying to light just the left side only one burner will light, firing the right turns them all on. Would but again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase .... buy it
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. I used to short order cook so buying this let me reminisce a little. With any flat top your gonna have higher heat areas so I'd say anything you want to cook on high heat keep towards the center of the grill and lower temp is more towards the front. I havent had any problems with ignition or anything for that matter. I feed a family of 4 on it, cooking meet and veggies regularly so the size is nice too. If you like your food on a flat top grill buy it plain and simple.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flat top grill
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I could have made for my husband’s birthday! This is a fantastic grill. Easy to set up, use and clean. My husband cooks every meal he possibly can on it and loves it. My only negative is that there was no cover that was included nor one recommended. I ended up purchasing one from another seller but it doesn’t do enough to keep it dry. Still searching for a way to safely store it out on our back deck since we use it so often but overall, very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Be the star of your neighborhood with this griddle
customer_reviews.text: The griddle works well for entertaining. We have used it for big parties and it fed a couple dozen people. As for preparing food for two, it functions well for that, too. For example, fried rice is easy to cook on the griddle. I put it together myself only having my husband on standby in case I needed help lifting. I added the surround table, but you could use a simple cart if space is an issue. It functions well and I have not had to contact the company for support.
customer_reviews.author: Marta SolitaireTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Legs falling apart after 2 years with minimal movement.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few years and I noticed the other week that the whole unit was noticeably slanted to the left. Since the warranty is well over there is not much I can do but try and bolt it together which would mean I won't be able to take it camping easily or build an enclosure or something for it to sit on instead. I'm extremely disappointed in this craftsmanship and durability long term especially since it was just sitting there and it started to fail. Besides those issues this has been an amazing flat top.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill. As everyone says
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill. As everyone says, amazing amount of space. Last night I made 10 burgers, 10 hot dogs, and a huge pile of grilled potatoes -- with room to spare! There are some things I'm not crazy about, like the front drip 'V' is not really deep enough, and cleanup is not as easy as a regular grill. The cover (which is purchased separate) is not waterproof. You have to keep this thing dry or it will rust immediately. All that said, I would still purchase this again. We really like it & just ordered a different make cover, hopefully that works. Buy it, you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: *** ABSOLUELY FANTASTIC !!!
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THE 28IN GRIDDLE FOR CAMPING FIRST TIME USE IT NEEDED TO BE SEASONED THAT TOOK ABOUT 30/45 MIN. AFTER THAT AWESOME FAST COOKING FOR 8 PEOPLE. I WAS AMAZED !! I FEEL THE QUALITY IS GREAT I ALSO ORDERED THE COVER AND THE SPATULA ACCESSORIES SET I WOULD ABSOLUTELY ORDER THIS ITEM AGAIN AND OR RECOMMEND TO EVERYONE. IT IS A LITTLE HEAVY BUT QUALITY IS GOOOOD!! BUY IT BUY IT BUY IT !!
customer_reviews.author: Yolande J Wright

customer_reviews.title: Awesome griddle!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!! Have cooked so much on it so far!! I have cooked on the 4 burner but decided to buy the 2 burner because of cost savings. I believe it's easier to control temp on 2 burner, the 4 burner runs really hot even turned to lowest settings. Great value!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ke-in

customer_reviews.title: Just do it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to clean, rather mobile for a grill, and so capable as a cook top! I broke it in with a seasoning session using the recommended Flaxseed oil, the process was a breeze. Just take it slow and be patient between coats. After that was done I had a really good idea of the heat distribution on the cook top. The firs meal I wiped up was three 16oz Ribeyes with mushrooms and asparagus. Amazingly delicious!! After I wiped down the top with an old rag and rolled the Blackstone into the garage until next time.
customer_reviews.author: Rushified-MN

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor cooking ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It’s well made. Easy to take care of. I don’t use my regular bar-b-que too much anymore. I consider it professional grade. It’s excellent for breakfasts and the sausage and peppers I make are the talk of the neighbors. Just remember it needs to be cared for, cleaned correctly and oiled before storage. I’m gonna get a lot of years out of this. Just get yourself the correct spatula, cover, and the other stuff to really be a pro. This is one of my top purchases ever on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: pawayne

customer_reviews.title: Warped.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the grill. Only reason for the low stars is after the 2nd or 3rd time I used it, when I went out the next day, the top was warped. It slowly cooled and I can’t think of any reason why it would warp. But it is. Makes keeping food and oil level and distributed a challenge at times. Disappointed in that. It’s also hotter in the middle than the sides, despite the new burner design.
customer_reviews.author: DanT

customer_reviews.title: Finally, my husband will do the cooking!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I made this purchase. I can't believe how versatile it is. We used to own a restaurant and loved having the flattop to cook on and now we have one at home! Have been making hibachi food on it and cooks perfectly. Only complaint is the actual top doesn't sit level. I wasn't too worried because I knew my patio probably wouldn't be level either. Since the "legs" are basically pegs that sit into holes, you can shim up a corner with a couple washers to level it to work with your ground anyway. Was bummed that Blackstone was out of stock on hard covers when I purchased the grill...that will be my next buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ted and Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill for my brother for Christmas. We got to use it for the first time on 3/8/2020 I was a bit skeptical because of how cheap the materials were on it, but knew that a friend had the same exact grill and loved it. As my brother moved the grill out of the garage the one caster broke off the bottom the grill. The welds on this thing are absolutely terrible. Being a welder myself, I'll get it fixed properly. I was very disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, well made piece. It has been a great addition to our outdoor living area. Keep in mind that you will need to buy the accessories separate. You will need either the griddle hard cover or the fabric cover. I got both. You may also want the cleaning kit, squeeze bottles, and basting cover. DON'T FORGET FLAX OIL! Blackstone suggests the initial seasoning be done with flax oil (he explains why on the Youtube video). After it is seasoned you can use whatever you want. Great purchase, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fair Play Wine Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grill for my boyfriend and he absolutely LOVES it, excellent price as always Amazon! It's so easy to use and we put it together in about 15 mins. The first thing he did was season the grill with grape seed oil (which is the most important thing to do before using it, there are helpful youtube videos on it) and then he got to using it. Food tastes great and you can cook a lot of things on it at once. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We previoysly had a 2 burner stove with griddle that had circular burners. It was a pain because the center of the griddle didn't get hot enough compared to the rest of it. I ordered this for my husband for his birthday and he uses it several times a week for dinner and every Sunday for breakfast. He loves it so much we ordered one for his dad and another for his brother. The heat distribution is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Lacking hardware and awful customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived without hardware and without a grease trap. Service is mediocre at best. After two tries we finally received the hardware but the grease trap is still nowhere to be seen even though we were told it would come with the hardware package. Clearly that was a lie. So as I’m writing this, I have been waiting forever for my call to Blackstone to be picked up... again. I’m not pleased to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this because her father has one. We have used it for every meal almost it works great. If you have ever worked for McDonald's or a similar fast food place, it is just like cooking on one of their grills for hamburger. It is very easy to clean if you do it right nothing hardly sticks aside from things like sauces but just drop some water on it and use a very good scrapper like one of the restaurants ones and it will come right off.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My inlaws have the 36" version and I always enjoyed using it. After that I had the itch, I have always wanted one for years. I knew I didn't need the big 36" one, this 28" griddle is the perfect size for us and can handle breakfast, lunch and dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Broke_Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: MAJOR DESIGN FLAW
customer_reviews.text: Major design flaw. The size is great, it cooks well and is well made; good quality. HOWEVER, the well along the front to catch drippings is way too shallow and narrow, the drain hole is way too small and it needs some sort of funnel to direct drippings into the catch tray. But, you get what you pay for. It's a pain in the a** to clean because of this flaw, otherwise a great grill for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Max73

customer_reviews.title: grease trap in the back of the top seems to be better then the one I seen at the big box store with it in the front
customer_reviews.text: The Blackstone 36in flattop griddle is a game changer I don't know why it took me so long to buy it if you follow the seasoning instructions you can't go wrong. I used canola oil,lard,and just cooking bacon across the whole top will work. Blackstone has videos for recipe idea's Breakfast is a breeze on this. and endless possibilities for future meals cheese steak was quick and easy having all the room for everything all at once. Smash burgers are another delicious item to make and let's not forget hibachi
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea, however in my case is a bad implementation. My griddle came scratched. I tried to season it, but I was only able to do it 2/3 of the surface. I used about 3/4 of a 20 lb propane tank. Their QA must be nonexistent. As the other person mentioned, the customer service is lacking. I placed an inquiry about 3 weeks ago and nothing yet. Too bad. I really wanted to like this.
customer_reviews.author: Silivestru

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting this for a long time and I purchased it for myself for Father’s Day. It had been sitting in the box waiting for this week to assemble. Unfortunately when I opened it up yesterday I noticed parts were missing. The box didn’t look to have been tampered with but once I payed everything out I was missing 2 wheels and other items. It looks like maybe those wheels and other items should have been in a separate box inside the large box but the only other box had the drip tray. Very disappointed as this weekend I couldn’t wait to cookout with my family. Not sure what to do now.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIANB

customer_reviews.title: Best grill I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill ever. We’ve done hibachi shrimp/chicken several times in first few weeks. Just cooking most items at same time is great. Only downside is the cleanup, but invest in some bar mop towels. That will save you on paper towels. I use one towel to cleanup and another dedicated to oil when done. Get a dome to cover food while cooking. Also get foil drip pans. I bought several dollar store lasagna foil pans to put cooked food in and sit right on grill to stop direct heat. I use cookie sheet to hold my tools to keep grease cleanup minimal.
customer_reviews.author: L Bly

customer_reviews.title: left burner not working
customer_reviews.text: Just received this grill and the left burner will not ignite. I have requested that the burner only be replaced. Waiting to hear back from Amazon or Blackstone. I really do not want to take apart to ship back, after already putting this together.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Story

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large families
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and thought I wouldn't use it much, I was wrong! I use this thing constantly as a bigger family of 6 this provides tons of space, no more cooking the kids breakfast first and standing at the stove with tons of dirty pots and pans. You can fit a bunch on here and it provides 4 separate zones that all adjust individually. Beyond glad I got this! We did get a soft cover as well but wish we had got a hard cover since water pools up on the soft cover when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We use this daily and it just keeps getting better. Easy start up, heats evenly and cleanup is a snap! Breakfast, lunch, and dinner never tasted so good! Get one! Really brings the family together with awesome tasting food!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile cooking
customer_reviews.text: The grill is very easy to assemble but you do need a second set of hands to put the griddle top on the base. There's no need to cook on high as the griddle top retains the heat very well. Cooking on high will drain the propane tank pretty quickly. There a slight learning curve on temp control but being able to cook anything on the top makes it more versatile compared to a regular grill.
customer_reviews.author: Dog lover

customer_reviews.title: It does not provide nearly enough heat
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy this again. It doesn’t get hot enough to cook for a good 20 minutes which means using a lot of propane. It’s impossible to use it in cooler weather because there’s not enough heat produced by the burners. Also the wind would blow the burners out. When I put the rain cover on, it leaked water after a rain. I would not waste your money, I would buy a decent grill that has a cover on it so you can cook in cool weather. I guess it would be OK if you like to cook out in the hot weather with no wind.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Griddle
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Griddle, if you do a lot of outside grilling this is the unit for you. Restaurant quality cooking in your back yard, heats evenly, lights quickly, temperatures stay where you set them, and clean up a breeze when done according to the instructions. Unit is well built and stands up well, our first use was cooking for our Fire Dept Christmas Supper, 200 ribeye steaks in 3 hr. Each one perfect, now that is one fantastic cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzard52

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Love the giddle. Cooked on it all summer. Easy to clean. Easy to move. The only thing wish it had a better way to carry the gas tank. It was easy to put together. Directions aren't so good. I looked at the picture and put it together. Little help with husband. Have lots of bacon to season it. I will be using it this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wind problems !!
customer_reviews.text: This griddle cooks very well and the food taste great except when the wind starts to get a little gusty the wind hits the flames and cools down the whole dam thing ! This makes it much harder to cook the food that's why the larger model has a option to buy the metal surround guard but there is nothing available for this model . (Poor engineering on their part to say the least !) Being a do it your self guy I'll have to make something for this problem !
customer_reviews.author: lioness

customer_reviews.title: Take your outdoor cooking to a new level.
customer_reviews.text: This has taken over as my favorite tool for outdoor cooking. I still have my grill, but the versatility of a gas-fired griddle will open up all sorts of new places for your culinary talents to explore. I'm cooking things I would have never tried. When you get one (You are getting one, right?), YouTube is your friend for learning all the things you can do. Once you get your techniques down, start experimenting. You'll be amazed where you can go.
customer_reviews.author: Bill from 336

customer_reviews.title: Grease removal has been improved.
customer_reviews.text: I just received, put together and tested my new Blackstone grill. Quality of the components far exceeded my expectations. The grill top is very heavy cast iron. One comment I wanted to make was that in other reviews the biggest complaint was the grease did not drain properly, and you had to buy an add on accessory to collect the grease in drip pan. The people at Blackstone must have listened because they redesigned the cook-top with the grease is now being diverted towards the back of the grill, and straight into a grease catcher. I haven't tested it yet,but it looks like it will be a big improvement over the previous model. See pictures. Happy grilling!.
customer_reviews.author: Graybeard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect patio piece
customer_reviews.text: What I like: large enough heating surface for most moderate or smaller sized parties. Propane is easy to use. Temps are consistent. Cleanup is fine for the most part. I do wish the grease trap in the back was a little easier to clean and more sturdy. Assembly was also easy. I do wish it came with a cover instead of making it a separate purchase. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: It's me

customer_reviews.title: No customer service??
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple weeks now. Seasoned, and have done a few cooks on it and I'm getting the hang of it. I absolutely love it and wonder why I didn't get one earlier. This thing is awesome! Knocked down a star because it seems that their customer service is sub-par. Cheesy spot welded nut to secure the side shelf broke. Contacted customer service a week ago with picture and a follow up e-mail a few days later. Still no response... Other than that, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kent H.

customer_reviews.title: It was a Awesome grill not anymore top rusted out
customer_reviews.text: April best grill i ever bought love it Update June Took the cover off and now the top is rusted Called amazon and they don’t have a phone number for black stone So right now I’m waiting for a email address to send for a replacement top I hope till then this gets a one rating considering I only used it twice Tony
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Does the meals
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4-burner and gifted the two burner to my son who has handled many-a-meals on it without flaw. Recommend a good oil coating after each use. This will not only cook a great breakfast but the steaks and burger are exceptional. Gets very hot and does a good job on searing food or making exceptional fried rice and almost any meal. Follow You Tube for tips on using this product.
customer_reviews.author: DanH

customer_reviews.title: Just one use so far, but fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This came a month ahead of likely delivery, the Amazon delivery guy was awesome. Now to the product: easy assembly, easy to clean and season the cooktop. First batch of burgers last night were a HUGE household hit. The product is well built, attractive, and very good at what it is supposed to do. Cannot wait for my accessories to arrive. I may never cook inside again.
customer_reviews.author: VandT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I had looked around at a lot of grills before coming to my decision. The Blackstone was well rated, but you never know, but that's why I buy Amazon Prime :D This has exceeded my expectations in every way. Followed the instructions for installation and seasoning (VERY IMPORTANT-- SEASON THE SURFACE) and was thrilled how it performed. Very non-stick, great heat and easy to clean. The model I have has the grease trap in the back, which was really nice, and didn't have any issues with it. (just make sure it stays centered!) Honestly, this was the best purchase I made all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Serack

customer_reviews.title: The right side burner will not ignite :(
customer_reviews.text: The right side burner will not ignite, after making sure it was all assembled correctly. I have called Amazon and requested that the right side burner only be replaced. Unfortunately they will not. Amazon wanted me to disassemble it, ship it back, they test it and if there's something wrong with it, they give me a refund :( . I really do not want to take it apart and ship it back, after already putting this together. Too much of a hassle. So if I were you, buy it from a store so you can easily take it back if there's something wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kurama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. **Update 1 year later ** I'm still in love with this griddle, I use it just about every single day and sometimes multiple times a day. My uncle got one too. The second they come out with the 4 footer, it will be in my cart.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cox

customer_reviews.title: Warped Steel Griddle Top
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my griddle for a couple of months now and it seemed to be working well. My main issue I have with it is that I was cooking on it the day before and all of a sudden I hear a loud noise. The Steel Griddle Top popped up and warped from the heat . I immediately moved the food from that side of the grill to the right side and turned off the burners . Once the steel top began to cool down the warp began to decrease. I have serious concerns this will happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Renteria

customer_reviews.title: Nice Griddle
customer_reviews.text: I like this griddle. I watched the Blackstone YouTube video on how to season and afterwards it had a nice non stick surface. The only thing I wish they would improve is making the legs adjustable so it could be leveled but I was able to improvise.
customer_reviews.author: Murds

customer_reviews.title: I think it is a good price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for what I need it for. I think it is a good price for what you get. Portable for those picnics I cook at, so it will get a lot of use this summer. Had to send the first one back because it was damaged in shipping. The second one was too, but I could live with it. I would suggest getting it from a local vender when they go on sale. Right after I ordered mine they went on sale for $25 less than what I paid. Shipping is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Love my Blackstone!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to my husband's outdoor kitchen! He loves it! The price was over $100 cheaper than what i had been pricing and we love our smaller one for the 5th wheel. You can cook everything on this! Seasoned it several times before the 1st use and it's easy to clean and food doesn't stick. Season it as you would a cast iron skillet. Leave the grill on, apply oil and clean it. Great purchase and arrived quickly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Cook top is a piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: The grill was great for the first few months and then the cook top started to peel. The finish is coming off our food. I seasoned the grill often and wiped it down after every use. The overall product is good but now it is useless because I can't cook on it. And don't try to order a new cook top - it has been on back order for month- wonder why ?? The company seems almost to be a guy working out of his garage and customer service is non existent. Avoid this product. Not worth it considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Neer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best, ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, ever! I couldn't wait to purchase this griddle because we love to cook and I know we would use it all the time. My favorite place to eat is at BD's Mongolian BBQ where they cook you stir fry on a massive Mongolian flat top grill. I needed to recreate that at home and the easiest way was with this griddle! I'm so in love! You can cook anything on this and it saves you on having to wash a lot of dishes. It's wonderful. I highly recommend getting this if you enjoy cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Trooper

customer_reviews.title: assembles easily, and has well-written instructions (including how to season ...
customer_reviews.text: This product performs quite well, assembles easily, and has well-written instructions (including how to season the top before use). My only complaints are how easy it is to potentially lose the one bolt for the shelf when folded (would be nice if it had a plastic washer like electric switches / outlets have to keep it from falling out) and the difficulty in getting the propane tank in the holder just right (the tolerance is a little slim). However, the portability factor is great - I can fit this in a car and go.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Angert

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for family get together time, when it arrived it required some assembly, easy if you follow the instructions. There is however a small issue with the shelf under the unit in that the screw holes did not quite line up and I wound up cross threading one of them. I removed the screws, re threaded the nuts and changed from a metric screw to a standard screw and now everything is cool. It was a little fix to get on with the assembly, seasoned according to instructions, and now am cooking with style. Very good product, would highly recommend to anyone, price is nice and delivery on time with Prime. Thanks, Blackstone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t love this thing anymore than I do. Makes things so easy to cook. I usually like burgers over charcoal but the old flat top bar flavor comes through on this.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal prepping
customer_reviews.text: Reason for purchase was because I started keto and started cooking a lot of meat. I’m in Florida and the house as an over the vent microwave that didn’t vent smells very well and i house would stink. Opted to get an outdoor flat top and cook almost all my meals on it. I love it, and cooks very evenly. I feel like a hibachi chef. Still haven’t mastered the bacon yet though. I highly recommend this grill. Perfect size, easy to store, and heats up quickly. Assembly wasn’t too bad and I assembled myself
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garcia

feature_bullets: RESTAURANT STYLE COOKING - With 470sq inches of flat top grilling, this griddle is perfect for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Cook eggs, pancakes, quesadillas, grilled cheese, steak, potatoes, teppanyaki style foods and more. Also enjoy a bottom shelf and two side shelves for food storage and prep

REPLACE YOUR STANDARD GRILL - Replace your grill or BBQ with a Blackstone griddle and never look back! This grill is simple to use and easy to assemble, so you'll be cooking in no time. Eliminate the hassle of kerosene, charcoal and matches; This grill includes an easy start, battery powered push button ignition. With the simple push of a button your griddle is ready to go! Take the headache away from outdoor cooking and spend more time enjoying the outdoors
TRANSPORT WITH EASE - Easily wheel around your yard or transport from your backyard to the campsite thanks to the removable griddle top, fold up legs and four industrial strength caster wheels

DURABILITY AND LONGEVITY - This Blackstone Grill is built to last with a powder coated black steel frame, stainless steel burners and thick cold rolled steel cooktop. Super simple to clean, making post-meal cleanup a breeze

CONTROLLABLE HEAT ZONES - Two independently controlled 15,000 BTU stainless steel burners make a total of 30,000 BTUs controlled low to high for versatile cooking options. Propane fueled by a standard 20lb tank with an accommodating tank storage tucked nicely under the left side shelf
